mods.abstract: The recording is of two segments of This Little Light of Mine. This Little Light of Mine is a show that provides introspection to the main influencers of African-American gospel. The segments are hosted by Bobby Jones (host). The first segment reflects on the life of Claude Joseph Johnson (singer/songwriter), and is called, "C. J. Johnson and the Down-Home Tradition." The second segment reflects on the life of Shirley Caesar (singer/songwriter), and is called, "Shirley Caesar: the Singing Evangelist." The recordings are from unidentified dates.
